metadata.title: CVE-2018-20721 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: URI_FUNC() in UriParse.c in uriparser before 0.9.1 has an out-of-boundsread (in uriParse*Ex* functions) for an incomplete URI with an IPv6 addresscontaining an embedded IPv4 address, such as a "//[::44.1" address.

criterions.comment: uriparser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
